name: Sweater
description:
A short platformer game inspired by classic platformers.

Sweater is a boy wearing a sweater, he lives with his friends in a small house in a place called Green Valley. One day Sweater's friends have been kidnapped by an evil scientist that wants to use their powers to glitch out the whole world, Sweater's mission is to rescue his friends and save the entire world.

CONTROLS:

WSAD/Arrows - Move

Space/W/Up arrow - Jump

Q - Attack

Esc - Pause

F4 - Fullscreen
